title: #88: Broken America
description:
To say that America is broken is an understatement, but what people don’t realize is that it is also broken in a literal sense as well.

From broken plumbing and potholed roads to polluted rivers, outdated ports, and faulty power grids, America’s infrastructure is a disaster these days.

How much longer can America kick the can of infrastructure repair down the road, when will politicians do their job of improving our country, and how bad are things going to get before the population rises up and demands that the government do its job?

Controlled Demolition on Amazon: https://www.amazon.com/dp/B08M21XKJ5
